name: MOTH (Madshack)
description:
The moth king went mad and left his own kingdom to rot. Now, the once great land of the Moth is a ruin left for you to explore.

This rpg maker game takes some gimmick of the metroidvania genre - exploration of an interconnected world and the use of some capacities scattered in the world needed to progress - in a 2d-platformer style inspired by game like LISA.

My plans for this game are more "modest" than my other - mostly unfinished, lol - projects. I'll try to make it from the beginning to the end fast and then add more optional contents whenever I feel like it.

For now, the available demo let you explore the first area and fight two bosses.

There is ennemies, some NPCs (not that much for now, but you'll see more of them in the future), an interconnected map, some collectibles and a healing system inspired by dark souls 2.

I hope you will enjoy the game, I really like working on it right now, hope this will stay like this for a while !

GAME INPUTS :

- arrow keys : move

- Enter or Z : interact with NPCs or items / jump small cliffs. Jumping is made by standing  near a small gap (left or right) or in front of a cliff smaller than you (up or down).

- Escape or X : Cancel / open the menu

IMPORTANT :
